# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.TM2 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Thermal Monitor 2. A value of true indicates the processor supports this technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: TM2
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
